name: Xilinx Serial Vector Format File
summary: Learn about .XSVF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Xilinx created the XSVF format for optimizing JTAG operations on Xilinx devices. They are used for testing embedded systems.

description: Binary file created for testing programmable logic device (PLD) designs; contains the compact, binary version of an ASCII text .SVF file; used for optimizing the file format of test cases for Xilinx devices.
